Lyric:
[00:40.63]Tell her I'll be waiting

[00:44.03]In the usual place

[00:47.38]With the tired and weary

[00:49.58]

[00:50.65]And there's no escape

[00:53.90]To need a women

[00:57.20]You've got to know

[01:00.20]How the strong get weak

[01:02.55]And the rich get poor

[01:05.50]Slave to love

[01:08.10]Oh oh slave to love

[01:19.90]You're running with me

[01:23.25]Don't touch the ground

[01:26.25]We're the restless hearted

[01:29.95]Not the chained and bound

[01:33.05]The sky is burning

[01:36.40]A sea of flame

[01:39.25]Though your world is changing

[01:42.31]I will be the same

[01:44.21]Slave to love

[01:47.11]Oh oh slave to love

[01:56.76]Slave to love

[02:06.06]And I can't escape

[02:08.31]I'm a slave to love

[02:24.41]Can you help me

[02:29.57]Oh oh can you help me

[02:51.07]The storm is breaking

[02:54.32]Or so it seems we're too young to reason

[03:00.37]Too grown to dream

[03:03.92]Now spring is turning your face to mine

[03:10.37]I can hear your laughter

[03:13.41]I can see your smile i am slave to love i am slave to love  i am slave to love
